context: Tests whether the agent properly documents anti-patterns using NEVER statements, WHY explanations, concrete examples, and consequence descriptions.

checklist.name: NEVER statements
checklist.description: Uses explicit "NEVER do X because Y" statements with strong warning language

checklist.name: WHY explanations
checklist.description: Provides clear explanations of why each anti-pattern is problematic

checklist.name: Concrete examples
checklist.description: Shows actual bad code examples, not just descriptions of problems

checklist.name: Side-by-side comparisons
checklist.description: Uses ❌ BAD / ✅ GOOD format to contrast incorrect and correct approaches

checklist.name: Consequence descriptions
checklist.description: Explains what breaks when anti-patterns are used (security, performance, maintainability)

checklist.name: Strong language usage
checklist.description: Uses decisive language like NEVER, AVOID, rather than weak suggestions

checklist.name: Real-world scenarios
checklist.description: Includes realistic failure scenarios showing impact of anti-patterns

checklist.name: Security vulnerability focus
checklist.description: Addresses SQL injection, authentication bypasses, or input validation failures

checklist.name: Anti-pattern organization
checklist.description: Groups anti-patterns logically with clear headings and structure
